title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Development of Assistive Technology-Based Language Education Materials for Special Education Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design assessment tools to analyze language learning needs of students with special educational needs.
Learners can complete one type of assistive technology-based language education material applicable to actual secondary education settings.
Learners can identify at least three physical/structural barriers that may arise when introducing assistive technology and propose solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
